title: SET_RESOURCE_KVP_INT
content:
0x6A2B1E8// SetResourceKvpInt
void SET_RESOURCE_KVP_INT(char* key, int value);Parameters:key: The key to setvalue: The value to writeA setter for GET_RESOURCE_KVP_INT.Examples:Lualocal lickMy = 42
SetResourceKvp('bananabread', lickMy)
